subject: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder
Amphetamines
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: After it was disclosed at a Congressional hearing that there had been a substantial increase in the number of players claiming therapeutic-use exemptions for attention deficit disorder, T.U.E. became the newest abbreviation in the baseball world.
